item.title: Cooling Planet Escalates Global Warming Hysteria
item.description: The increased urgency to legislate or judicially impose new, draconian burdens on society to “save the planet” is not your imagination. Neither is it a response to increasingly rising temperatures. Temperatures have been falling for 8 years now, and have not risen in more than 10. The reason the AGW alarmists need to impose restrictions is: credit. Remember the ozone holes? According to leftists, the holes were caused by chloroflourocarbons like refrigerant used in air conditioning.
